projects.title: Dawn
projects.description: Dawn was a anonymous dating app for iOS/android with 100 daily active users. Built the app from scratch with a partner. I was responsible for building the recomedation algrothithm, the matching system, the profile creation system, the reveal feature (2nd slide) and many of the onboarding screens.

projects.title: TimeBlox
projects.description: Timeblox is a social accountability dashboard. It is a Chrome extension that takes over the users tab. It allows users to set tasks, set timers, and track their progress. It also allows users to see their friends progress. I was responsible for building out the UI, the share feature and various client side data handling.

projects.title: Wine Predictive Modelling
projects.description: This Python-based project created a modeling web application for a datset about different wine varieties. I pre-porcessed the data and applied a model to predict the class of wine given certain parameters. I then deployed a web application using Streamlit.
